Here is a simplified version of the text for an A2 level learner:

Some time ago, a website warned people about sharing their whereabouts online. The website said that when you share where you are, you are also telling everyone else, including people you might not want to meet. This made people realize that there might be some downsides to sharing so much online.

We love sharing our lives on the internet. We can share photos, stories, and thoughts with people all around the world. But sometimes we forget that what we share online can affect our real lives. We might say things online that we wouldn't say in person, and this can get us into trouble.

A long time ago, some brave people started sharing their lives online. They were called bloggers. They shared their thoughts, photos, and stories with the world. Some of them got famous, but some also got into trouble.

One blogger, Justin Hall, shared his life online from 1994. He shared his thoughts, photos, and art. People loved reading about his life, but he also got into trouble. He fell in love and shared it online, but his partner didn't like it. He had to take his blog down.

Another blogger, Heather Armstrong, shared her life online too. She wrote about her job and her life. But one day, her boss found out and she lost her job. This is called the "online distribution effect." It means that what we say online can affect our real lives.

Heather Armstrong learned a valuable lesson. She realized that she should be careful what she shares online. She stopped blogging for a while, but then started again and focused on her family. Now she is a famous blogger and writes about her life as a mom.

We can learn from Heather's experience. We should think carefully before sharing our lives online. We can say anything online, but that doesn't mean we should.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text for an A2 learner:

Some scientists were worried about a low-budget movie called What the Bleep Do We Know? The movie combines documentary and drama to show that we don't know a lot about the universe. This is true, and even scientists don't know everything. Some scientists thought the movie was too scary, but others thought it was interesting. 

At first, I didn't understand what all the fuss was about. Scientists were talking about new discoveries that show the universe is very strange. But then I saw some amazing things, like how water can change shape because of our thoughts. 

Some people think this is amazing, but scientists want more proof. They need to see more than just pretty pictures. 

Actually, there are many discoveries that show the universe is very strange. For example, scientists have found a type of matter that we don't know about, and a force that makes the universe grow. 

In other areas, scientists have found that our brains work differently than we think, and they have discovered where humans first lived and how they spread across the world. Some scientists even think that the existence of life on Earth is connected to the design of the universe. 

Despite what some people think, science is not finished. We still don't know many things, and some things are impossible to understand. This is why some scientists are trying to create a theory that explains everything. 

In summary, the universe is very amazing, and we still have a lot to learn.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text, adapted for a level A2 learner:

I like writing novels, but I love writing short stories. Writing a novel is like planting a big forest, while writing a short story is like planting a small garden. Both are important and help me become a better writer. When I finish a novel, I like to write some short stories. When I finish a few short stories, I feel like writing a novel again. I never write short stories while I'm writing a novel, and I never write a novel while I'm writing short stories. This helps me switch between the two and keeps my writing fresh.

I started writing short stories in 1984. It was a new experience for me, but I enjoyed it. I felt like I could explore new ideas and worlds. My readers liked this new side of me as a writer. One of my first short stories was included in a collection of stories. I liked that short stories are quick to write. It usually takes me a week to finish one. This is different from writing a novel, which can take months or years. Writing short stories is like taking a break from writing a novel. I can write about small things, like an idea or a picture in my mind. Sometimes it's like improvising music, and the story takes shape on its own. If a short story doesn't work out, I don't worry about it. I know that even famous writers like F. Scott Fitzgerald and Raymond Carver didn't always write perfect stories. I can learn from my mistakes and use them to improve my next story.

Writing short stories helps me when I write novels. It's like an experiment, and I can try new things without worrying about making mistakes. Without short stories, writing novels would be even harder for me. My short stories are like small footprints I leave behind. I remember where I wrote each one and how I felt when I did. Short stories are like a way for me to share my feelings with my readers, and it makes me happy.<|eot_id|>

Here is a simplified version of the passage, written at the A2 level:

Science is a way of understanding the world. It helps us cure diseases and makes our lives easier. But it also has its limits. Sometimes it's hard to understand very small things, like atoms, or very big things, like the universe. Scientists have different ideas and sometimes disagree with each other. They come from different backgrounds and have different personalities. Some scientists are very good at explaining things, while others are not. 

Over time, scientists have changed their ideas about the world. They used to think the universe was like a big clock, but now we know it's more complicated. Some people think science can't explain everything, but scientists keep trying. They make new discoveries and improve our understanding of the world. 

In the past, scientists thought they knew everything, but then they discovered new things like radioactivity and quantum mechanics. Today, scientists are still making new discoveries. 

Science is important because it helps us control nature and make decisions about our future. We need to understand science to make good choices for our children and the planet.

Here is the simplified text for an A2 learner:

For a long time, book sales were growing. But from around 2015, big publishers started to say that ebook sales were not growing as much as they used to. Some even said they were falling. This made people wonder if ebooks would eventually replace printed books. One person in the book industry said that ebooks might have caused some companies to make bad decisions and lose confidence in the importance of books.

Many people still think that ebooks will replace printed books, but the truth is that both can coexist. We still use both ebooks and printed books. This idea of ebooks replacing printed books is not new. In the past, people thought that new technologies would replace old ones. For example, when television came out, some people thought radio would disappear. But radio didn't disappear; people just started listening to it in different ways.

We also worry about the future of books because we become attached to the things we use every day. We get used to using books, computers, and other things, and we feel sad when they change. That's why we often look back to the past and miss the things we used to have. This happens with many things, like cars, music, and photography.

Some people are worried that ebooks will replace printed books, but this is not true. We can still use both ebooks and printed books. The idea of ebooks replacing printed books is just a way for us to understand and talk about change. We use this idea to think about how technology changes our lives and how we feel about it.

Here is a simplified version of the text for an A2 learner:

I used to wake up every weekday morning at 5:30, brush my teeth, make some coffee, and write about how famous people in the past made time for their work. I wanted to show that even great minds have daily routines and habits that help them be creative and productive. I looked at what they ate, when they slept, and how they worked. This book is about how they did their daily tasks, not just their final work. It's also about my own struggles with balancing work and personal life.

I asked myself questions like: How do you do good work and still earn a living? Should you focus on one thing or do many small things each day? And when you have too much to do, what should you give up? I don't have all the answers, but I found examples of how other successful people handled these challenges.

The book's title is "Daily Rituals," but I really wanted to write about people's daily routines. A routine can be good or bad, but a good one can help you make the most of your time, willpower, and optimism. Even a famous psychologist who wrote about habits struggled with procrastination himself!

I was supposed to write a story one Sunday, but instead, I spent the day tidying up and making coffee. Then I started looking at how other writers worked and had the idea for this book. I collected stories about their routines and wrote this book. I tried to keep it short and interesting, and I used quotes from their letters, diaries, and interviews. I also used information from other people's research. I hope you enjoy the book!<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text for an A2 learner:

Howard became a palaeontologist because of a change in his family's plans when he was six years old. His father had to cancel their holiday to Spain because of high interest rates. Instead, they went to the English coast and Howard found an ammonite on the beach. He knew he wanted to be a palaeontologist and studied it in university. He became interested in the early days of life on Earth, not the dinosaurs. He finished his studies and was unsure if he would get a job. He applied for a job at Tavistock College in London, but wasn't sure if he would get it. The professor who was supposed to interview him had an argument with his wife and didn't show up. Another professor replaced him, and Howard got the job. He was surprised but happy to have it.

Months later, a colleague told him that the other professor had helped him get the job because he didn't like his enemy. Howard was a bit disappointed but happy to have the job. He liked his work and could support himself. He often thought about how his personal life was different from his work. In his work, he could plan and do things, but in his personal life, things could happen unexpectedly. One day, his briefcase was stolen, and he had to cancel a lecture. He went to the police and reported the theft. Later, he met a colleague who told him about a new collection of fossils at the Natural History Museum in Nairobi. Howard was very interested and decided to go there to study the fossils. He cancelled his other plans and saved up money to go to Nairobi.

Note: I simplified the language, shortened the sentences, and removed complex vocabulary and phrases to make it easier for an A2 learner to understand.<|eot_id|>

Charles Spence is a professor who studies how our senses work together to help us enjoy food. He and his team at Oxford University have found out many interesting things about how we eat. For example, did you know that the person who orders first in a restaurant usually likes their food the most? They also found out that we eat more when we're with other people.

Professor Spence's research helps food companies make better food and drinks. He works with big companies and restaurants to make sure their food tastes good. He also helps them make changes to make their food healthier.

Professor Spence has worked with famous chefs, like Heston Blumenthal, to create new and interesting dishes. He has also found out that the sounds we hear can affect how food tastes. For example, high-pitched music makes food taste sweeter, and low-pitched music makes it taste bitter.

At home, Professor Spence likes to have fun with his family. They have dinner parties and try new foods and drinks. They even play with special lights and sounds to see how it affects their taste. Professor Spence's work is all about making food and eating more enjoyable and fun.<|eot_id|>

Here is a simplified version of the text, written for a learner of English at the A2 level:

Our brains are very busy. We have a lot of information coming at us, and we have to sort out what's important and what's not. At the same time, we're doing more things on our own. We used to rely on travel agents and salespeople to help us, but now we do everything ourselves. We're like superheroes, doing many tasks at once, but our brains aren't really good at this. We think we're doing many things at the same time, but actually, we're just switching between tasks quickly.

Dr. Earl Miller, a scientist, says that our brains aren't good at multitasking. When we think we're doing many things, we're actually switching between tasks quickly. This can be stressful and make us less efficient. Multitasking can also make us feel like we're getting a lot done, but we're actually getting less done.

Our brains have a hard time focusing because we're always looking for new and exciting things. This can make it hard to stay focused on one task. Even worse, multitasking can make us feel like we're getting a lot done, but we're actually making mistakes and getting less done.

Some scientists think that this is because our brains are not good at multitasking. They call it "info-mania." When we're trying to focus on one task, but we have emails and messages distracting us, it can reduce our intelligence. It's like our brains are getting tired.

In the end, we need to be careful about how we use our brains. We need to focus on one task at a time and not get distracted by too many things.<|eot_id|>

In a Swedish zoo, a chimpanzee named Santino liked to break up concrete and throw it at visitors during the day. Was he being naughty? In caves in the US, female bats help other bats who can't have their babies. Are they being kind? Fifty years ago, people thought animals just did things without thinking. But now, scientists are studying animals and finding out that they might have feelings and morals. This has started a big debate: can animals think and feel like humans do? 

Some scientists think animals can feel pleasure and pain, like humans do. For example, cows that opened a locked gate to get food seemed happy and jumped around. If cows enjoy solving problems, what does it mean for how we treat them? Some people think we should stop eating meat. Others think we should learn more about animal thinking and behavior. 

There are different opinions about this topic. Some scientists think animals might have a simpler way of thinking than humans. Others think we should stop giving human-like thoughts to animals. The problem is that it's hard to know what it's like to be an animal, like a bat or a cow. 

One scientist did an experiment with starlings, a type of bird. He found that starlings in nice cages were more willing to eat food even when it was not good. He thinks this means that being in a bad environment can make animals feel sad and pessimistic. Another scientist agrees with him, but some people might not like this idea because it makes them think about how we treat animals.<|eot_id|>

Some people think that technology is changing the way we think. They say that we are not using our brains as much as we used to because we are relying too much on technology. Adrian West, a researcher, says that we are exposed to a lot of bad information and opinions online, which can make it hard to think clearly. He also says that having too much information can be overwhelming and make it difficult to make good decisions.

Some people think that reading is important for thinking critically. Patricia Greenfield, a professor, says that reading helps us develop our imagination, reflection, and critical thinking skills. She also says that visual media, like video games and TV, can be fun, but they don't help us think as much as reading does.

However, some people think that technology can also be good for our brains. James Paul Gee, a professor, says that video games can be a good way to learn and develop our thinking skills. He says that some games, like Sim City and Civilization, can teach us how to make good decisions and think critically.

Overall, it's important to remember that technology is not all good or all bad. It's up to us to use it in a way that helps us think clearly and make good decisions.

Here is the simplified text for an A2 learner:

Matthew Crawford is a writer and a motorcycle mechanic. He used to work in an office, but he didn't like it. He wrote a book about the benefits of doing manual work. His latest book is about how to deal with modern life.

Crawford noticed that advertisements appear on our phones and computers even when we're just doing simple tasks. This makes it hard for us to think and remember things. We're also getting used to avoiding conversations with strangers because we're always interrupted. We're constantly surrounded by things that try to get our attention, like video games and apps.

Crawford is worried that we're losing the ability to focus and think deeply. We're getting more used to doing things quickly and easily, but this can make us feel tired and unable to concentrate. He thinks that we need to find ways to use our judgment and pay attention to the world around us.

Crawford gives the example of a cook, an ice-hockey player, and a motorbike rider. These people have to deal with real things, like food, ice, and roads. They use their judgment and work with others to achieve their goals. This is different from using a computer or phone, where we're just following instructions.

Crawford thinks that we should find ways to use our judgment and pay attention to the world. This can help us feel more satisfied and focused. We can do this by doing things that require our full attention, like cooking or playing sports. This can also help us be more present and aware of others.

Do you ask people what they do for a living? It's a common question. But what if someone says they're a philosopher? It's not always easy to answer. People might think you're saying you're better than others or that you know some special secrets. But that's not true. Philosophers are just people who think deeply about life.

A long time ago, the Greek philosopher Aristotle said that a life of thinking is the best life. But most people don't think like that today. Instead, they associate philosophy with thinking deeply about important issues. Socrates, another Greek philosopher, said that a life without thinking is not worth living. He meant that we should think about what we do and why we do it.

Philosophers used to be interested in big questions about life, but now many of them focus on very specific topics. This makes it hard for people without a lot of knowledge about philosophy to understand what they're talking about. This is a problem because philosophy should be about helping people think about their lives and make good decisions.

I'm a philosopher, and I sometimes describe myself as an ethicist. I think about what's right and wrong. But I think there's more to philosophy than just deciding what's right or wrong. Philosophy can help us think about our daily lives and make sense of the world. It's not just about big ideas, but about how we live our lives.

Here is the simplified text for an A2 learner:

Food is important to many people. Some people think about what and how we eat because it can make eating more enjoyable. However, philosophers have not talked much about food until now. When they did talk about eating, it was usually to help them understand other things, not food itself. 

One ancient Greek philosopher named Epicurus liked to eat and drink. His name is now used to name restaurants and food shops. People use his name to show that their food is good.

Food is important because it is social and cultural. We get food from our community and share it with others. We interact with food more than with any other thing we buy. This is why food is a good topic for philosophers to think about.

Some people write about food and tell others what they think about it. They are not experts because they can describe what food tastes like. Philosophers have not studied how we perceive taste before.

Food can also be beautiful, like a painting or a symphony. Some people think that food is now important in art, but it is eaten and gone, unlike other beautiful things. 

There are also important questions about what we should eat. Should we eat food that is organic, free-range, or locally grown? These questions show what we believe about food.

Finally, food can bring people together. When we cook at home, we have a special responsibility to our guests because of our relationships with them. When we cook in a restaurant, we have different responsibilities to our employer and the food.

Some people think that food can help us understand different cultures. We can learn to appreciate other cultures by trying their food and eating together. This is a way to build relationships and understand each other better.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text:

Rob Daviau, a game designer from the US, created a new type of board game called "legacy" games. He wanted to make games more exciting and challenging. He took an old game called Risk and made it into a legacy game. This means that players' decisions in one game affect the next game. They might even have to tear up cards or damage the board.

Daviau worked on another game called Pandemic, where players work together to save the world from diseases. He also created a game called SeaFall, where players are sailors exploring the world.

To make sure the story of the game stays good, designers have to think about all the different choices players might make. They test the games with players to see how they work out. One player, Jaime, said it takes a lot of time to test the game and fix any problems that come up.

Daviau didn't think many people would like legacy games, but he was wrong. Many players love them because they are exciting and make them feel like they are part of a big story. One player, Russell, said it's like learning a new game every time you play. Another player, Ben, said it's like watching a TV series, where you want to keep watching to see what happens next.

Daviau thinks that legacy games are a new way to make board games more interesting. He wants to see what other designers come up with. The publisher of SeaFall, Colby, thinks it's a big change in how we think about board games.

Note: I've kept the main ideas and facts from the original text, but simplified the language and sentence structure to make it easier for an A2 learner to understand.<|eot_id|>

Here is a simplified version of the text, written for a level A2 learner:

One night, a clever octopus named Inky escaped from a tank at a big aquarium in New Zealand. He slid across the floor and went down a small drain to get to the ocean. This is a fun story that many people loved to read online.

We like to imagine that animals are like us. We think they can do things like us, like opening jars or playing with toys. Octopuses are very smart, but they have bodies that are very different from ours. They have eight arms and can do many clever things, like recognizing faces and using shells for protection.

Some people think it's not good to imagine animals are like us, but Dr. Frans de Waal, a scientist who studies animals, says this is not true. He says we often forget that animals are very smart and can do many things like us. They can even think about the past and the future, feel sorry for others, and understand what others are thinking.

A long time ago, people thought animals were very smart and could even be put on trial for crimes. But then, some scientists thought that animals were just machines that reacted to things. They thought animals couldn't think or feel like humans do. This changed how people treated animals, and many animals suffered.

But now, scientists like Dr. de Waal are showing that animals are much smarter than we thought. They can do many things on their own, like remembering where they put things or finding food. We can learn from animals and understand them better.

Dr. de Waal thinks it's good that people are starting to understand animals better. He says we can learn from them and treat them with more respect. We can also learn from our own mistakes and be kinder to animals.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text for an A2 learner:

Robots are becoming more important in many areas of life. They can do tasks that humans used to do, like building and working in shops. Experts think that robots will soon be used in many more areas, and this will change the way we work and live. Many people think that robots will take over jobs, but they don't think it will happen to them. However, experts say that almost all jobs will be affected by robots in the next few years.

For example, a company in Australia has made a robot that can lay bricks much faster than humans. Another company in the US has made a robot that helps keep supermarket shelves stocked and tidy. Some people think that robots will create new jobs for technicians and programmers, but others worry that humans will lose their personal touch in work.

A expert on robotics, Dr. Zhang, says that robots will become smarter and more efficient. He thinks that many companies will need to hire people to work with robots, but some jobs may be lost. He also thinks that people will need to learn new skills to work with robots.

In the future, we will see robots that can live in our homes and interact with us in new ways. This will bring new opportunities and challenges, like making sure we are safe and private. To prepare for this, we need more people to study science, technology, engineering, and maths (STEM).

Note: I simplified the text by:

* Breaking down long sentences into shorter ones
* Using simpler vocabulary
* Removing complex concepts and jargon
* Focusing on the main ideas and removing unnecessary details
* Changing the tone to make it more accessible to an A2 learner<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text for an A2 learner:

Many people wonder why people climb mountains. A famous climber, George Mallory, said, "Because it's there." This means that sometimes people climb because it's a challenge and they enjoy it. Climbing can be a fun and exciting experience.

A writer, Tejada-Flores, wrote about different types of climbing. He said that there are different rules for each type of climb. For example, climbing a small rock or climbing a big mountain are two different things.

Some people love climbing because it makes them feel free. They like the feeling of being in nature and being active. But climbing can also be scary and difficult. Sometimes climbers have to wait for bad weather to pass or deal with other challenges.

A climber, Joe Fitschen, asked a different question: "Why do people climb?" He said that it's because it's in our nature to take risks and try new things. Climbing can be fun because it's a challenge.

Another climber, Brian Treanor, said that climbing can help people develop good qualities like courage, humility, and respect for nature. Climbing can be a way to learn these things and become a better person.

Some climbers like to climb alone and without help. They have to be very focused and determined to succeed. This can make their achievements more special.

Climbing can also be a way to relax and feel calm. It's like a kind of meditation. Some people find that climbing helps them feel peaceful and happy.

These are just a few reasons why people climb mountains. It's a complex activity that can be many things to different people.<|eot_id|>

Alfred Brendel was a famous pianist who played classical music for many years. He was a serious and focused person who loved to play and record music. He didn't teach many students, but he liked to help a few special ones. One day, a young boy named Kit Armstrong came to one of Brendel's concerts and asked for lessons. Brendel was surprised because Kit was very good at playing the piano. He played many songs from memory and did it very well. Brendel was impressed and decided to teach Kit.

Kit is a hard worker and always wants to learn more. He likes to learn new languages, play tennis, and write computer code. He also composes his own music. Brendel is very happy to see Kit's progress and says he has a great memory and can play many songs by ear. He is also very good at listening to Brendel's advice and can play what he teaches him.

Brendel is now 80 years old and has stopped performing, but he still loves music. He says he never thought about being famous when he was young, but he wanted to play certain pieces by the time he was 50. He did most of what he wanted, but then he kept going because there were still some things he wanted to do. Even though he can't play as much as he used to, he still thinks about music all the time and wants to learn more.

Note: I kept the main ideas and events of the original text, but simplified the vocabulary and sentence structures to make it more accessible to an A2 level learner. I also removed some of the more complex musical terms and concepts to make it easier to understand.<|eot_id|>

Here is a simplified version of the text, suitable for an A2 learner:

I used to think that gardens were always beautiful and peaceful. My grandad's garden was near a river and had a slope down to the water. I loved listening to the sound of the river and the birds singing in the trees. I thought all gardens were like this.

My grandad's garden was not special, but it was nice. He didn't have a big greenhouse like some of his neighbors, but he grew many plants. My dad was a quiet person, but he liked to make me laugh. He had funny phrases he would say, like "It's immaterial to me." He was not very ambitious, but he was good at fixing things around the house.

My parents moved house only once, but my mom liked to change the furniture. She would get new chairs and tables, and sometimes even a piano. I wanted to play the piano, but my mom said I wouldn't practice. My sister had lessons instead. I liked the river more than the woods or the moors. I would go there with my imagination and pretend I was in another world.

I wanted to leave school as soon as possible, but it didn't seem possible. But then my dad told me about a job in the Parks Department for an apprentice gardener. He thought I might be interested. I was happy, and I think my dad was happy too. He might not have liked gardening, but he saw how much I loved it and thought it would be good for me.

Note: I simplified the language, shortened the sentences, and removed some complex vocabulary and phrases to make it more accessible to an A2 learner.<|eot_id|>

Here is a simplified version of the text for an A2 learner:

Lawrence MacEwen lives on a small island called Muck in Scotland. I'm visiting him there. The wind is strong and it's hard to stand up. But Lawrence is happy here. He has a dog named Tie. They go for a walk to show me around. We see other islands nearby. Lawrence tells me about his farm. He has sheep and geese. The MacEwens have lived on Muck for a long time - over 3,000 years!

Lawrence's family runs the farm, hotel, and cottages on the island. His wife, Jenny, helps with the farm. His son, Colin, manages the cottages. His daughter, Mary, runs the hotel with her husband, Toby. They like that their boys can play outside and sail boats in the summer.

Life on the island can be tricky. Sometimes the electricity goes off, and we have to use torches. We also don't have mobile phones. But we make do. One day, some musicians came to the island and played music. Everyone enjoyed it.

Lawrence tells me how he met his wife, Jenny. Her father bought a farm on another island without even seeing it. Jenny was sent to manage it, but she didn't know much about farming. She was good at typing, though!

I eat well on the island. We get food from the sea and from the farm. I go to the fisherman, Sandy, to get fresh fish. We eat it for dinner. The next day, I have to leave the island, but I might be stuck for a few more days if the ferry doesn't come. That's okay, because I'm enjoying my time on Muck.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text:

The video game industry is no longer just for young enthusiasts. It's now a serious job. But it's not easy to get into. Many people think you need a degree in computer science, but one expert says that's not true. He says the best way to get into the industry is to make games.
